duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing MRI procedures on a variety of patients, both invasive and non-invasive, utilizing sterile technique if necessary.
Operating and manipulating complex MRI equipment and assisting physicians as needed.
Manipulating computer data and images for interpretation, and reproducing them on film or utilizing a networking system for permanent storage.
Functioning without constant supervision and taking responsibility for designated areas and procedures.
Ensuring the safety of patients and staff in the MRI suite, and implementing patient MRI screening.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of a JRCERT accredited Radiography program.
ARRT and/or ARMRIT registered in Magnetic Resonance Imaging.
Preferred: Two (2) years experience in MRI.
Required to be fully vaccinated for COVID-19 based on local, state, and federal law or regulations (unless a medical or religious exemption is approved).
